dict.acceptation: 形成；构成，结构；形成物；编队，队形；

sent.orig: Comprehensive Formation is the general name of plane formation, color formation and Three Dimentional Composition.
sent.trans: 综合构成是“平面构成”、“色彩构成”、“立体构成”的合称。

sent.orig: Songre Formation is carnian period; Jiangxiong Formation and Zhangcun Formation is norian period.
sent.trans: 宋热组时代为晚三叠世卡尼期，江雄组和章村组为晚三叠世诺利期。

sent.orig: The study on formation cause of plagioclase is closely related to formation cause of geological structure.
sent.trans: 历史上发生的陨击事件对地球表面岩层构造产生了极其严重、深刻和长远的影响。

sent.orig: He placed the Jurassic-Cretaceous Boundary between the Yixian Formation and the Jiufotang Formation.
sent.trans: 他根据多年的研究，将侏罗-白垩系界线置于义县组与九佛堂组之间。

sent.orig: Upper Cretaceous: Including the Sifangtai Formation—Minshui Formation, corresponding to the Cenonian—Maestrichtian.
sent.trans: 四方台组—明水组为白垩系上统，相当于赛诺—梅斯特利克蒂阶(Senonian—Maestrichtian)。
